main event: A radar detected an unidentified flying object, but it was not visually observed and posed no threat to air operations.
interesting points: The radar detected an unidentified flying object, but it was not visually observed.
The object was described as large, oval, and flat, with a white, luminous, and light-giving appearance.
The object was observed for 15-20 minutes, and was maneuverable and slow.
One sighting included a chromatic trail that lasted longer than the others.
The sighting occurred approximately 20 miles northwest of Kassel, Germany, at an altitude of 2,000 feet.
